title: Women representation in law firms
summary: This graph shows the percentage of the staff in different industries that are Women , compared to female representation in Law_Firms .
Law_Firms are shown to have the fewest Women of these Sector , about 35 percentage , while the Insurance Sector employs the largest proportion of Women at 65 percentage .
gold: The chart compares the percentage of female representation across different sectors . Whilst insurance and tech sectors are leading the charge at over 60 % , law firms are farther behind around 35 % .
